title: Can’t wait for Prime Day? Save hundreds on this lifetime cloud backup right now
content:
Macworld

Want to keep your data safe over the long haul without spending a small fortune on cloud storage? Then Degoo Premium is exactly what you need. And since a lifetime subscription costs hundreds less during Deal Days, there’s never been a better time to get it.

Deal Days is our own version of Amazon’s Prime Day. Only, instead of giving you just one measly day, we’re giving you from now until 11:59 pm on July 14 to take advantage of it. And that includes the opportunity to get a lifetime subscription to Degoo Premium at a price that’s so low it’ll be hard for anyone to beat.

Degoo Premium is one of the more celebrated cloud backups on the market. Subscribers receive a massive 10TB worth of space to store all kinds of files, they keep everything protected using 256-bit AES encryption, and it can be used across all devices regardless of platform. You can even find your photos easily with their AI-based image identification tool. 

If you need a cloud backup but don’t want to pay a ton, then try a lifetime subscription to Degoo Premium — Discounted to just $97.97 until 11:59 pm on July 14 during Deal Days.

 

Degoo Premium: Lifetime 10TB Backup Plan – $97.97

See Deal

Prices subject to change.
